title: Infinite Loop Detected
description: The program enters an infinite loop and fails to terminate.

title: Cannot Save
description: The application fails to save user data, causing potential data loss.

title: Keyboard Not Found
description: The operating system does not detect the keyboard, making input impossible.

title: Unexpected Response
description: The server responds with an unrecognized status, disrupting normal operations.

title: Null Pointer Exception
description: An attempt to access a null object reference causes the program to crash.

title: Memory Leak
description: The application fails to release memory, causing increased memory usage over time.

title: Database Connection Timeout
description: The server fails to connect to the database within the specified timeout.

title: Incorrect User Authentication
description: The login function fails to authenticate valid users intermittently.
